data.partBlankContent: She was born in Venice. Her fat___, na___ Giovanni Marinelli was a physician, so w__ her bro____, Curzio Marinelli. Nothing i_ known how____ about h__ mother. The soc___ position o_ the fam___ enabled h__ to le___. She married Girolamo Vacca, who was also a physician.
data.fullContent: She was born in Venice. Her father, named Giovanni Marinelli was a physician, so was her brother, Curzio Marinelli. Nothing is known however about her mother. The social position of the family enabled her to learn. She married Girolamo Vacca, who was also a physician.
data.answer: 她出生在威尼斯。她的父亲乔瓦尼·马里内利(Giovanni Marinelli)是一名医生，她的弟弟库齐奥·马里内利(Curzio Marinelli)也是。然而，关于她母亲的情况却一无所知。家庭的社会地位使她能够学习。她嫁给了吉罗拉莫·维卡，他也是一名医生。
